Sentencas: This composite is the precursor material of the cermet YSZ/Ni, which is used as solid oxide fuel cell anode material.

Sentencas: The performance of the anode is strongly dependent on the microstructural properties of the cermet.

Sentencas: Therefore, the control of the microstructure of the YSZ/NiO composite is a key step for the fabrication of high-performance anodes.

Sentencas: In this study, the composites were prepared by a modified liquid mixture technique.
